name: Nagaland Rashtra bhasa Prachar Samiti

address: Tsieramia Building, L. Khel, Kohima Village

briefDescription: Established in the year 2002 by Dr. B. P. Philip, Secretary Registration No H/RS-3768.  Managing Board:  Chairman	 	: Savilie Kruneilie – Vice chairman	 	:  Rose Mary Dzuvichu. Secretary	 	: Dr. BP Philip Joint Secretary 	: Neiketouzo Victor DzüvichüTreasurer		: Abhijit Payeng •	Key Issues; Animal Husbandry, Dairying & Fisheries, Agriculture, Art & Culture, Children, Drinking Water, Education & Literacy, Sanitation, Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation, Tribal Affairs, Back to school for drop outs,  Vocational Training, Water Resources, Women's Development & Empowerment, Child development, Youth Affairs, Art and craft, Shelter for orphans, Girl Child education to uplift the down trodden and economically weak.

address: DBS Road, L. Khel, Kohima Village
